ul.li: Young 5’s through 8th grade Public School Academy
Structured environment for individual academic success
Educate the whole child (social, emotional, physical, academic)
Ranked Top 5% by Michigan Department of Education
Ranked #1 in Genesee County M-STEP scores
Ranked #1 in Oakland County M-Step scores in Social Studies and English Language Arts

p.span:
What do you do when you have time to spend at home? Young Huskies make games to practice telling time! Way to be remarkable, Holly Academy!
